div.h1: omitField() does not take into account the members in parent class

a.title: Export this issue in another format
A permanent link to this comment.

div.div:
Jï¿½rg Schaible
added a comment -
14/Jan/14 12:08 PM

div.p: This behavior is by design. You have to provide the declaring type. This is explicitly stated in the Javadocs to XStream.omitField.

div.div:
Jï¿½rg Schaible
added a comment -
14/Jan/14 12:08 PM
This behavior is by design. You have to provide the declaring type. This is explicitly stated in the Javadocs to XStream.omitField.
